lead_paragraph: Italy eased into the Davis Cup quarterfinals with an insurmountable 3-0 lead against Switzerland after Simone Bolelli and Andreas Seppi beat Marco Chiudinelli and Henri Laaksonen in straight sets on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Italy Through to Davis Cup Quarters, 3-0 Up vs. Switzerland
headline.main: Italy Through to Davis Cup Quarters, 3-0 Up vs. Switzerland

snippet: Italy eased into the Davis Cup quarterfinals with an insurmountable 3-0 lead against Switzerland after Simone Bolelli and Andreas Seppi beat Marco Chiudinelli and Henri Laaksonen in straight sets on Saturday....
